text.author: Steve Bell
text.description: Olympics minister, Tessa Jowell, yesterday defended her estranged husband
text.title: Steve Bell: Mills gets jail term in Berlusconi bribe case

main.p: Mills gets jail term in Berlusconi bribe case Mills gets jail term in Berlusconi bribe case Photograph: Steve Bell/GuardianIllustration: Copyright © Steve Bell 2009Mills gets jail term in Berlusconi bribe case Photograph: Steve Bell/GuardianIllustration: Copyright © Steve Bell 2009Explore more on these topicsTessa JowellSilvio BerlusconiItalyDavid Mills
